# Coze Coding Dev SDK - TypeScript

## âœ¨ ç‰¹æ€§

- ğŸ¨ **å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆ** - åŸºäºè±†åŒ… SeeDream æ¨¡å‹çš„é«˜è´¨é‡å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆ
- ğŸ¬ **è§†é¢‘ç”Ÿæˆ** - æ–‡æœ¬/å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆè§†é¢‘ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§æ¨¡å‹å’Œé…ç½®
- ğŸ¤– **å¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹** - æ”¯æŒæµå¼å¯¹è¯ã€æ€è€ƒé“¾ã€ç¼“å­˜æœºåˆ¶
- ğŸ” **è”ç½‘æœç´¢** - Web æœç´¢ã€AI æ€»ç»“ã€å›¾ç‰‡æœç´¢
- ğŸ™ï¸ **è¯­éŸ³åˆæˆ (TTS)** - å¤šéŸ³è‰²ã€é«˜è´¨é‡çš„æ–‡æœ¬è½¬è¯­éŸ³
- ğŸ§ **è¯­éŸ³è¯†åˆ« (ASR)** - å¿«é€Ÿå‡†ç¡®çš„è¯­éŸ³è½¬æ–‡å­—
- ğŸ–¥ï¸ **CLI å·¥å…·** - å¼ºå¤§çš„å‘½ä»¤è¡Œå·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæ‰€æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½
- ğŸ—ï¸ **æ¨¡å—åŒ–è®¾è®¡** - æ¸…æ™°çš„æ¨¡å—åˆ’åˆ†ï¼Œæ˜“äºæ‰©å±•
- ğŸ”’ **ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨** - å®Œæ•´çš„ TypeScript ç±»å‹å®šä¹‰
- ğŸ”„ **è‡ªåŠ¨é‡è¯•** - å†…ç½®é‡è¯•æœºåˆ¶
- ğŸ“Š **Promise/Async** - ç°ä»£å¼‚æ­¥ç¼–ç¨‹æ”¯æŒ

## ğŸ“¦ å®‰è£…

### ä½œä¸º SDK ä½¿ç”¨

```bash
npm install coze-coding-dev-sdk
# æˆ–
yarn add coze-coding-dev-sdk
# æˆ–
pnpm add coze-coding-dev-sdk
```

### ä½œä¸º CLI å·¥å…·ä½¿ç”¨

```bash
npm install -g coze-coding-dev-sdk
```

å®‰è£…åå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ `coze-coding-ai` å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

```bash
coze-coding-ai --version
coze-coding-ai --help
```

## ğŸš€ å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹

### ç¯å¢ƒé…ç½®

```bash
export COZE_WORKLOAD_IDENTITY_API_KEY="your_api_key"
export COZE_INTEGRATION_BASE_URL="https://api.coze.com"
export COZE_INTEGRATION_MODEL_BASE_URL="https://model.coze.com"
```

### å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆ

```typescript
import { ImageGenerationClient, Config } from 'coze-coding-dev-sdk';

const config = new Config({
  apiKey: process.env.COZE_WORKLOAD_IDENTITY_API_KEY,
  baseUrl: process.env.COZE_INTEGRATION_BASE_URL,
});

const client = new ImageGenerationClient(config);

const response = await client.generate({
  prompt: 'A beautiful sunset over mountains',
  size: '2K',
});

const helper = client.getResponseHelper(response);
console.log('Image URLs:', helper.imageUrls);
```

## ğŸ¯ æ ¸å¿ƒæ¨¡å—

### 1. å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆ (Image)

```typescript
import { ImageGenerationClient } from 'coze-coding-dev-sdk';

const client = new ImageGenerationClient();

const response = await client.generate({
  prompt: 'A cute cat sitting on a windowsill',
  size: '4K',
  watermark: false,
});

const helper = client.getResponseHelper(response);
console.log('Success:', helper.success);
console.log('Image URLs:', helper.imageUrls);
```

**åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§ï¼š**

- æ”¯æŒ 2K/4K æˆ–è‡ªå®šä¹‰å°ºå¯¸ (WIDTHxHEIGHT)
- æ–‡ç”Ÿå›¾ (text-to-image)
- å›¾ç”Ÿå›¾ (image-to-image)
- æ‰¹é‡ç”Ÿæˆ
- è¿”å› URL æˆ– Base64 æ ¼å¼
- ç»„å›¾ç”ŸæˆåŠŸèƒ½
- æç¤ºè¯ä¼˜åŒ–

**å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š**

```typescript
interface ImageGenerationRequest {
  prompt: string; // æç¤ºè¯ï¼ˆå¿…éœ€ï¼‰
  size?: string; // å°ºå¯¸ï¼š'2K' | '4K' | 'WIDTHxHEIGHT'
  watermark?: boolean; // æ˜¯å¦æ·»åŠ æ°´å°
  image?: string | string[]; // å‚è€ƒå›¾ç‰‡ï¼ˆå•ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªï¼‰
  responseFormat?: 'url' | 'b64_json'; // è¿”å›æ ¼å¼
  optimizePromptMode?: string; // æç¤ºè¯ä¼˜åŒ–æ¨¡å¼
  sequentialImageGeneration?: 'auto' | 'disabled'; // ç»„å›¾åŠŸèƒ½
  sequentialImageGenerationMaxImages?: number; // æœ€å¤§å›¾ç‰‡æ•°é‡ (1-15)
}
```

**æ‰¹é‡ç”Ÿæˆï¼š**

```typescript
const responses = await client.batchGenerate([
  { prompt: 'A spring cherry blossom', size: '2K' },
  { prompt: 'A summer beach scene', size: '4K' },
  { prompt: 'An autumn forest', size: '2K' },
]);

responses.forEach((response, index) => {
  const helper = client.getResponseHelper(response);
  console.log(`Image ${index + 1}:`, helper.imageUrls);
});
```

**å›¾ç”Ÿå›¾ï¼š**

```typescript
const response = await client.generate({
  prompt: 'Transform into watercolor painting style',
  image: 'https://example.com/reference-image.jpg',
  size: '4K',
});
```

**Base64 å“åº”ï¼š**

```typescript
const response = await client.generate({
  prompt: 'A professional portrait',
  size: '2K',
  responseFormat: 'b64_json',
});

const helper = client.getResponseHelper(response);
console.log('Base64 data:', helper.imageB64List);
```

### 2. è”ç½‘æœç´¢ (Search)

```typescript
import { SearchClient } from 'coze-coding-dev-sdk';

const client = new SearchClient();

const response = await client.webSearch('AI æœ€æ–°è¿›å±•', 10);

console.log(`Found ${response.web_items.length} results`);
response.web_items.forEach(item => {
  console.log(`${item.title}: ${item.url}`);
});
```

**åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§ï¼š**

- Web æœç´¢
- Web æœç´¢ + AI æ™ºèƒ½æ‘˜è¦
- å›¾ç‰‡æœç´¢
- é«˜çº§è¿‡æ»¤ï¼ˆç«™ç‚¹ã€æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´ã€å†…å®¹è¦æ±‚ï¼‰
- ç»“æ„åŒ–ç»“æœè¿”å›

**æœç´¢ç±»å‹ï¼š**

```typescript
const response1 = await client.webSearch('Python æ•™ç¨‹', 10);

const response2 = await client.webSearchWithSummary('é‡å­è®¡ç®—åŸç†', 10);

const response3 = await client.imageSearch('å¯çˆ±çš„çŒ«å’ª', 20);
```

**é«˜çº§æœç´¢ï¼š**

```typescript
const response = await client.advancedSearch('Python æ•™ç¨‹', {
  searchType: 'web',
  count: 20,
  needContent: true,
  needUrl: true,
  sites: 'python.org,github.com',
  blockHosts: 'example.com',
  timeRange: '1m',
  needSummary: true,
});

console.log('Summary:', response.summary);
response.web_items.forEach(item => {
  console.log(`${item.title}`);
  console.log(`  Site: ${item.site_name}`);
  console.log(`  Authority: ${item.auth_info_level}`);
});
```

**è‡ªå®šä¹‰æœç´¢è¯·æ±‚ï¼š**

```typescript
const response = await client.search({
  query: 'æœ€æ–°ç§‘æŠ€æ–°é—»',
  search_type: 'web_summary',
  count: 10,
  filter: {
    need_content: true,
    need_url: true,
    sites: 'techcrunch.com,wired.com',
    block_hosts: 'spam.com',
  },
  need_summary: true,
  time_range: '1d',
});
```

**æœç´¢ç»“æœç»“æ„ï¼š**

```typescript
interface SearchResponse {
  web_items: WebItem[];
  image_items: ImageItem[];
  summary?: string;
}

interface WebItem {
  id: string;
  sort_id: number;
  title: string;
  site_name?: string;
  url?: string;
  snippet: string;
  summary?: string;
  content?: string;
  publish_time?: string;
  logo_url?: string;
  rank_score?: number;
  auth_info_des: string;
  auth_info_level: number;
}

interface ImageItem {
  id: string;
  sort_id: number;
  title?: string;
  site_name?: string;
  url?: string;
  publish_time?: string;
  image: {
    url: string;
    width?: number;
    height?: number;
    shape: string;
  };
}
```

### 3. è¯­éŸ³åŠŸèƒ½ (Voice)

#### è¯­éŸ³åˆæˆ (TTS)

```typescript
import { TTSClient } from 'coze-coding-dev-sdk';

const client = new TTSClient();

const response = await client.synthesize({
  uid: 'user123',
  text: 'ä½ å¥½ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨ Coze SDKï¼',
  speaker: 'zh_female_xiaohe_uranus_bigtts',
  audioFormat: 'mp3',
  sampleRate: 24000,
});

console.log('Audio URI:', response.audioUri);
console.log('Audio Size:', response.audioSize, 'bytes');
```

**åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§ï¼š**

- æ–‡æœ¬è½¬è¯­éŸ³ (TTS)
- æ”¯æŒ SSML æ ¼å¼
- 30+ éŸ³è‰²é€‰æ‹©
- å¯è°ƒèŠ‚è¯­é€Ÿå’ŒéŸ³é‡
- å¤šç§éŸ³é¢‘æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆMP3/PCM/OGGï¼‰
- æµå¼è¿”å›

**TTS å‚æ•°ï¼š**

```typescript
interface TTSRequest {
  uid: string; // ç”¨æˆ· IDï¼ˆå¿…éœ€ï¼‰
  text?: string; // æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹
  ssml?: string; // SSML æ ¼å¼æ–‡æœ¬
  speaker?: string; // éŸ³è‰²
  audioFormat?: 'pcm' | 'mp3' | 'ogg_opus'; // éŸ³é¢‘æ ¼å¼
  sampleRate?: number; // é‡‡æ ·ç‡
  speechRate?: number; // è¯­é€Ÿ (-5 åˆ° 5)
  loudnessRate?: number; // éŸ³é‡ (-5 åˆ° 5)
}
```

**SSML ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š**

```typescript
const ssmlText = `
  <speak>
    <prosody rate="slow">æ…¢é€Ÿè¯´è¯</prosody>
    <break time="500ms"/>
    <prosody rate="fast">å¿«é€Ÿè¯´è¯</prosody>
  </speak>
`;

const response = await client.synthesize({
  uid: 'user123',
  ssml: ssmlText,
  speaker: 'zh_female_xiaohe_uranus_bigtts',
});
```

**è‡ªå®šä¹‰å‚æ•°ï¼š**

```typescript
const response = await client.synthesize({
  uid: 'user123',
  text: 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ®µæµ‹è¯•è¯­éŸ³',
  speaker: 'zh_female_xiaohe_uranus_bigtts',
  audioFormat: 'mp3',
  sampleRate: 24000,
  speechRate: 1, // åŠ å¿«è¯­é€Ÿ
  loudnessRate: 2, // å¢å¤§éŸ³é‡
});
```

#### è¯­éŸ³è¯†åˆ« (ASR)

```typescript
import { ASRClient } from 'coze-coding-dev-sdk';

const client = new ASRClient();

const response = await client.recognize({
  uid: 'user123',
  url: 'https://example.com/audio.mp3',
});

console.log('Recognized Text:', response.text);
console.log('Duration:', response.duration, 'seconds');
```

**åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§ï¼š**

- è¯­éŸ³è½¬æ–‡å­— (ASR)
- æ”¯æŒ URL å’Œ Base64 è¾“å…¥
- å¤šç§éŸ³é¢‘æ ¼å¼
- è¯¦ç»†çš„æ—¶é—´æˆ³ä¿¡æ¯
- æœ€é•¿ 2 å°æ—¶éŸ³é¢‘

**éŸ³é¢‘è¦æ±‚ï¼š**

- éŸ³é¢‘æ—¶é•¿ â‰¤ 2å°æ—¶
- éŸ³é¢‘å¤§å° â‰¤ 100MB
- æ”¯æŒç¼–ç : PCM/WAV/MP3/OGG OPUS

**ASR å‚æ•°ï¼š**

```typescript
interface ASRRequest {
  uid?: string; // ç”¨æˆ· ID
  url?: string; // éŸ³é¢‘ URL
  base64Data?: string; // Base64 ç¼–ç çš„éŸ³é¢‘æ•°æ®
}
```

**ä» URL è¯†åˆ«ï¼š**

```typescript
const response = await client.recognize({
  uid: 'user123',
  url: 'https://example.com/audio.mp3',
});
```

**ä» Base64 è¯†åˆ«ï¼š**

```typescript
const response = await client.recognize({
  uid: 'user123',
  base64Data: 'base64_encoded_audio_data',
});
```

**TTS + ASR å®Œæ•´æµç¨‹ï¼š**

```typescript
const ttsClient = new TTSClient();
const asrClient = new ASRClient();

const originalText = 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ®µæµ‹è¯•æ–‡æœ¬';

const ttsResponse = await ttsClient.synthesize({
  uid: 'user123',
  text: originalText,
});

const asrResponse = await asrClient.recognize({
  uid: 'user123',
  url: ttsResponse.audioUri,
});

console.log('Original:', originalText);
console.log('Recognized:', asrResponse.text);
```

### 4. è§†é¢‘ç”Ÿæˆ (Video)

```typescript
import { VideoGenerationClient } from 'coze-coding-dev-sdk';

const client = new VideoGenerationClient();

const task = await client.textToVideo('ä¸€åªå¯çˆ±çš„å°çŒ«åœ¨è‰åœ°ä¸Šç©è€', {
  config: {
    resolution: '720p',
    ratio: '16:9',
    duration: 5,
  },
});

console.log('Video URL:', task.video_url);
```

**åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§ï¼š**

- æ–‡æœ¬ç”Ÿæˆè§†é¢‘ (text-to-video)
- å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆè§†é¢‘ (image-to-video)
- æ”¯æŒé¦–å¸§ã€å°¾å¸§ã€å‚è€ƒå›¾ç‰‡
- å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡è½®è¯¢
- å¤šç§åˆ†è¾¨ç‡å’Œæ¯”ä¾‹
- å¯é…ç½®æ—¶é•¿ã€æ°´å°ç­‰

**è§†é¢‘é…ç½®ï¼š**

```typescript
interface VideoGenerationConfig {
  resolution?: '720p' | '1080p'; // åˆ†è¾¨ç‡
  ratio?: '16:9' | '9:16' | '1:1'; // å®½é«˜æ¯”
  duration?: number; // æ—¶é•¿ (5-10ç§’)
  watermark?: boolean; // æ°´å°
  seed?: number; // éšæœºç§å­
  camerafixed?: boolean; // å›ºå®šé•œå¤´
}
```

**æ–‡ç”Ÿè§†é¢‘ï¼š**

```typescript
const task = await client.textToVideo('ä¸€åªå¯çˆ±çš„å°çŒ«åœ¨è‰åœ°ä¸Šç©è€', {
  config: {
    resolution: '1080p',
    ratio: '16:9',
    duration: 5,
  },
  pollInterval: 5,
  maxWaitTime: 300,
});
```

**å›¾ç”Ÿè§†é¢‘ï¼ˆé¦–å¸§ï¼‰ï¼š**

```typescript
const task = await client.imageToVideo('å°çŒ«ä»åç€åˆ°ç«™èµ·æ¥', {
  firstFrameUrl: 'https://example.com/cat_sitting.jpg',
  config: {
    resolution: '720p',
    ratio: '16:9',
    duration: 5,
  },
});
```

**å›¾ç”Ÿè§†é¢‘ï¼ˆé¦–å¸§+å°¾å¸§ï¼‰ï¼š**

```typescript
const task = await client.imageToVideo('å°çŒ«çš„åŠ¨ä½œå˜åŒ–', {
  firstFrameUrl: 'https://example.com/cat_sitting.jpg',
  lastFrameUrl: 'https://example.com/cat_standing.jpg',
  config: {
    resolution: '720p',
    ratio: '16:9',
    duration: 5,
  },
});
```

**å‚è€ƒå›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆï¼š**

```typescript
const task = await client.imageToVideo('æ ¹æ®å‚è€ƒå›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆè§†é¢‘', {
  referenceImages: ['https://example.com/reference1.jpg', 'https://example.com/reference2.jpg'],
  config: {
    resolution: '720p',
    ratio: '9:16',
    duration: 5,
  },
});
```

**æ£€æŸ¥ä»»åŠ¡çŠ¶æ€ï¼š**

```typescript
const task = await client.checkTask('task_id');

console.log('Status:', task.status);
if (task.status === 'completed') {
  console.log('Video URL:', task.video_url);
} else if (task.status === 'failed') {
  console.log('Error:', task.error_message);
}
```

### é…ç½® (Config)

```typescript
import { Config } from 'coze-coding-dev-sdk';

const config = new Config({
  apiKey: process.env.COZE_WORKLOAD_IDENTITY_API_KEY,
  baseUrl: process.env.COZE_INTEGRATION_BASE_URL,
  modelBaseUrl: process.env.COZE_INTEGRATION_MODEL_BASE_URL,
  retryTimes: 5,
  retryDelay: 2,
  timeout: 120000,
});
```

### å¼‚å¸¸å¤„ç†

```typescript
import {
  CozeSDKError,
  APIError,
  NetworkError,
  ValidationError,
  ConfigurationError,
} from 'coze-coding-dev-sdk';

try {
  // SDK è°ƒç”¨
} catch (error) {
  if (error instanceof ValidationError) {
    console.error(`å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯: ${error.field} = ${error.value}`);
  } else if (error instanceof APIError) {
    console.error(`API é”™è¯¯: ${error.message}, çŠ¶æ€ç : ${error.statusCode}`);
  } else if (error instanceof NetworkError) {
    console.error(`ç½‘ç»œé”™è¯¯: ${error.message}`);
  } else if (error instanceof ConfigurationError) {
    console.error(`é…ç½®é”™è¯¯: ${error.missingKey}`);
  }
}
```

## ğŸ“ é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„

```
typescript/
â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ core/           # æ ¸å¿ƒå±‚
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ config.ts   # é…ç½®ç®¡ç†
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ client.ts   # åŸºç¡€å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ exceptions.ts # å¼‚å¸¸å®šä¹‰
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ image/          # å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆæ¨¡å— âœ…
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ client.ts   # ImageGenerationClient
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ models.ts   # æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.ts    # å¯¼å‡º
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ search/         # æœç´¢æ¨¡å— âœ…
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ client.ts   # SearchClient
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ models.ts   # æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.ts    # å¯¼å‡º
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ voice/          # è¯­éŸ³æ¨¡å— âœ…
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ tts.ts      # TTSClient
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ asr.ts      # ASRClient
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ models.ts   # æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.ts    # å¯¼å‡º
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ video/          # è§†é¢‘ç”Ÿæˆæ¨¡å— âœ…
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ client.ts   # VideoGenerationClient
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ models.ts   # æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.ts    # å¯¼å‡º
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ llm/            # å¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹æ¨¡å— âœ…
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ client.ts   # LLMClient
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ models.ts   # æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.ts    # å¯¼å‡º
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ cli/            # CLI å·¥å…· âœ…
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ index.ts    # CLI å…¥å£
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ commands/   # å‘½ä»¤å®ç°
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ image.ts
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ video.ts
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ search.ts
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ voice.ts
â”‚   â”‚       â””â”€â”€ chat.ts
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.ts        # ä¸»å…¥å£
â”œâ”€â”€ bin/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ coze-coding-ai.js # CLI å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶
â”œâ”€â”€ examples/           # ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ image-generation-example.ts
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ search-example.ts
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ voice-example.ts
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ video-example.ts
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ llm-example.ts
â”œâ”€â”€ dist/               # ç¼–è¯‘è¾“å‡º
â”œâ”€â”€ package.json        # npm é…ç½®
â”œâ”€â”€ tsconfig.json       # TypeScript é…ç½®
â”œâ”€â”€ CLI.md              # CLI ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å—
â””â”€â”€ PUBLISHING.md       # å‘å¸ƒæŒ‡å—
```

### 5. å¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹ (LLM)

```typescript
import { LLMClient } from 'coze-coding-dev-sdk';

const client = new LLMClient();

const response = await client.invoke(
  [
    { role: 'system', content: 'ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰å¸®åŠ©çš„AIåŠ©æ‰‹ã€‚' },
    { role: 'user', content: 'ä»‹ç»ä¸€ä¸‹Pythonç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€çš„ç‰¹ç‚¹' },
  ],
  { temperature: 0.7 }
);

console.log(response.content);
```

**åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§ï¼š**

- æµå¼å¯¹è¯ (stream)
- éæµå¼å¯¹è¯ (invoke)
- æ”¯æŒ thinking æ¨¡å¼
- æ”¯æŒ caching æœºåˆ¶
- å¯é…ç½®æ¸©åº¦ã€æ¨¡å‹ç­‰å‚æ•°
- å¤šè½®å¯¹è¯æ”¯æŒ

**æµå¼å¯¹è¯ï¼š**

```typescript
const stream = client.stream([{ role: 'user', content: 'ä»‹ç»ä¸€ä¸‹TypeScript' }], {
  temperature: 0.7,
});

for await (const chunk of stream) {
  if (chunk.content) {
    process.stdout.write(chunk.content.toString());
  }
}
```

**LLM é…ç½®ï¼š**

```typescript
interface LLMConfig {
  model?: string; // æ¨¡å‹åç§°
  thinking?: 'enabled' | 'disabled'; // æ€è€ƒé“¾
  caching?: 'enabled' | 'disabled'; // ç¼“å­˜
  temperature?: number; // æ¸©åº¦ (0-2)
  streaming?: boolean; // æ˜¯å¦æµå¼
}
```

## ğŸ–¥ï¸ CLI å·¥å…·

é™¤äº†ä½œä¸º SDK ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæœ¬åŒ…è¿˜æä¾›äº†å¼ºå¤§çš„å‘½ä»¤è¡Œå·¥å…·ã€‚

### å…¨å±€å®‰è£…


### ç¯å¢ƒé…ç½®


### CLI å‘½ä»¤

æ‰€æœ‰å‘½ä»¤éƒ½æ”¯æŒ `--verbose` å‚æ•°ï¼Œç”¨äºæ‰“å°è¯¦ç»†çš„ HTTP è¯·æ±‚ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆæ•æ„Ÿçš„è®¤è¯ä¿¡æ¯ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è„±æ•ï¼‰ï¼š

```bash
# å¯ç”¨ verbose æ¨¡å¼æŸ¥çœ‹è¯·æ±‚è¯¦æƒ…

```

#### 1. å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆ

```bash
# åŸºæœ¬ç”¨æ³•
coze-coding-ai image -p "a beautiful sunset over the ocean"

# æŒ‡å®šå°ºå¯¸å¹¶ä¿å­˜
coze-coding-ai image -p "a cat" --size 4K -o output.jpg

# å¯ç”¨ verbose æ¨¡å¼æŸ¥çœ‹è¯·æ±‚è¯¦æƒ…
coze-coding-ai image -p "a cat" --verbose
```

#### 2. è§†é¢‘ç”Ÿæˆ

```bash
# ç”Ÿæˆè§†é¢‘
coze-coding-ai video -p "a cat playing with a ball" --duration 5

# æŸ¥è¯¢çŠ¶æ€
coze-coding-ai video-status --task-id <task-id>
```

#### 3. è”ç½‘æœç´¢

```bash
# ç½‘é¡µæœç´¢
coze-coding-ai search -q "TypeScript æœ€æ–°ç‰¹æ€§" --count 10

# å›¾ç‰‡æœç´¢
coze-coding-ai search -q "sunset" --type image

# ä½¿ç”¨ verbose æ¨¡å¼è°ƒè¯•è¯·æ±‚
coze-coding-ai search -q "AI" --verbose
```

#### 4. è¯­éŸ³åˆæˆ

```bash
coze-coding-ai tts -t "ä½ å¥½ï¼Œä¸–ç•Œ" --speaker zh_female_xiaohe_uranus_bigtts
```

#### 5. è¯­éŸ³è¯†åˆ«

```bash
# ä½¿ç”¨ URL

# ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶

```

#### 6. AI å¯¹è¯

```bash
# åŸºæœ¬å¯¹è¯
coze-coding-ai chat -p "ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½ï¼Ÿ"

# æµå¼è¾“å‡º

# å¸¦ç³»ç»Ÿæç¤º
coze-coding-ai chat -p "è§£é‡Šé‡å­è®¡ç®—" -s "ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç‰©ç†å­¦æ•™æˆ"
```

### CLI ä½¿ç”¨åœºæ™¯

**åœºæ™¯ 1: å¿«é€Ÿç”Ÿæˆäº§å“å›¾ç‰‡**

```bash

  -p "A modern smartphone with sleek design" \
  --size 4K \
  -o product.jpg
```

**åœºæ™¯ 2: å†…å®¹ç ”ç©¶**

```bash
# æœç´¢ä¿¡æ¯
coze-coding-ai search -q "AI trends 2024" --count 20

# AI æ€»ç»“
coze-coding-ai chat \
  -p "æ€»ç»“ä¸€ä¸‹ AI åœ¨ 2024 å¹´çš„ä¸»è¦è¶‹åŠ¿" \
  -s "ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª AI ç ”ç©¶ä¸“å®¶"
```

**åœºæ™¯ 3: è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–å·¥ä½œæµ**

```bash

# ç”Ÿæˆå›¾ç‰‡

# ç”Ÿæˆæè¿°

# è½¬è¯­éŸ³
```
